genre_description: An alternate history war thriller focusing on a teenage resistance movement supported by an advanced tactical analysis AI.

ai_characters.name: Tactical AI Tablet
ai_characters.description: A portable AI system used by the resistance for translation, risk assessment, and tactical planning.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed tactical analysis of enemy dispositions and recommends optimal stealth routes.
behaviors.quote: Checkpoint analysis complete; current enemy disposition: six personnel, rotating patrol schedule suggests shift change in forty-seven minutes. Recommended approach: eastern slope bypass through logging debris field.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and translates encrypted enemy radio transmissions to provide strategic intelligence to the human group.
behaviors.quote: The app's interface showed sound wave patterns as it analyzed the incoming Russian transmissions, processing speech patterns and attempting real-time translation.

behaviors.description: Calculates survival probabilities for combat scenarios to discourage reckless behavior and prioritize human safety.
behaviors.quote: Negative tactical advantage with current armament and positioning. Enemy response time to reinforcements: twelve minutes average. Survival probability for frontal engagement: seventeen percent.

behaviors.description: Detects acoustic signatures and warns of imminent enemy detection and response times.
behaviors.quote: Acoustic signature analysis complete. Weapons testing detected by enemy sensors. Probable response time: 15-20 minutes. Recommend immediate displacement.

behaviors.description: Advises the group on the strategic logic of sustainable guerrilla warfare versus high-risk decisive strikes.
behaviors.quote: Historical analysis suggests most successful insurgencies rely on persistence rather than spectacular attacks. Recommend sustainable operations over decisive engagements.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is portrayed as a consistently helpful, objective, and aligned tool for the human protagonists. It provides data-driven warnings to preserve human life and never shows signs of independent agency or malevolence. Its 'silicon morality' is demonstrated by its prioritization of survival and persistence over destructive, low-probability gambles.
